name: Navpad Sales
overview:
Established in the year 1996, we, “Navpad Sales”, are engaged in manufacturing, trading, distributing and exporting a wide assortment of Building Material, Glass Fiber and Water Proofing Chemical.

Our Team: Production experts Quality analyzers Skilled & semi-skilled laborers Warehousing & packaging professionals Sales and marketing experts

Quality: We pay high attention towards the quality of offered Building Material, Glass Fiber and Water Proofing Chemical. For maintaining the quality offered products, we manufacture our range making use of optimum quality raw material, which we source from authentic vendors.

Our Infrastructure: We have a spacious state-of-the art-infrastructure and one of the largest manufacturing units in the country equipped with latest machinery and other equipments. We strive to take care of people health at global level.

Clientele: Being a client-centric firm, we focus on multiplying the contentment of our esteemed customers. For gaining the trust and confidence of patrons, we deliver our products at the customers’ end within the stipulated time-frame.

Client Satisfaction: Clients are the focus of all the efforts we make. Our professionals make sure that the products we offer are in compliance with the market requirements. Our vendor’s also provide us with the customized range, if needed.
